Text:
If you are using OS X Lion (10.7), you must download Alias Automotive SP1 from the AutoDesk website: http://usa.autodesk.com/adsk/servlet/ps/dl/item?siteID=123112&id=17433411&linkID=12268769

Not sure yet if it will work with the included patch but will update when I know.

Don't bother downloading. Alias Automotive 2013 is out. Only SP1 will run on Lion and there is no crack for it.

Do yourself a favour. Go elsewhere and get 2013.
